definition: erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 差一點|差一点[cha4 yi1 dian3]

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的汇率比昨天稍微低一点儿。

sentences.english: I'm feeling goose bumps now. I was having death threats, I never felt safe for 3 and a half years.
sentences.chinese: 有人恐吓说要我的命，那三年半我没有一点儿安全感。

sentences.english: Obviously, Cuiping was nervous and so her smile was not genuine.
sentences.chinese: 翠平显然很紧张，笑声一点儿也不好听。

sentences.english: In this aspect, I think, pater bags have the edge on plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 我认为在这方面纸袋要比塑料袋强一点儿。

sentences.english: and jump in leaves,there is no harm.
sentences.chinese: 在树叶中跳跃，一点儿也不碍事。

sentences.english: Though he has walked a long way, he does not look a bit tired.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然走了那么长的路，但看上去一点儿不疲倦。

sentences.english: This sunshine should lift up your spirits a little.
sentences.chinese: 阳光会使你的精神振作一点儿。

sentences.english: Now let me help you with a little liquid food.
sentences.chinese: 现在就让我来帮助您吃一点儿流质食物吧。

sentences.english: It was a puzzling remark and still leaves me a little puzzled.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个令人迷惑的描述，仍然让我感到一点儿困惑。

sentences.english: They're a little bit better now.
sentences.chinese: 现在他们稍好一点儿了。

sentences.english: She arrives a smidgen ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 她比预定的时间仅早到了一点儿。

sentences.english: I never saw her again,  nor I regret it.
sentences.chinese: 此后我再也没见到过她，对此我一点儿也不后悔。

sentences.english: In fact, he was jet black without a spot of white.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他通体漆黑，不杂一点儿白毛。

sentences.english: She didn't stir at all when she got back her wedding ring.
sentences.chinese: 找回她的结婚戒指，她一点儿也不激动。

sentences.english: It'll be just perfect with a little chili oil.
sentences.chinese: 如果再加上一点儿辣椒油就再好不过了。

definition: the slightest amount or degree/a bit
Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
